CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 13, 1954, pg. 9, reads: "Top Meals - The Centre News, 2167 Centre Avenue, has grown to a full-fledged restaurant. Good, home-cooked meals are their forte, disigned [designed] to please the Sunday after-church crowd.  Their beautifully designed new front, along with a cozy atmosphere, is aimed to please their customers."
TitMainTitle: Centre News restaurant, with neon sign in window advertising "restaurant, dining room, ice cream," 2167 Centre Avenue, Hill District, horizontal format
